summary: Deprecated `exclude_calendar` field in ScheduleSpec causes ErrorException when creating a schedule with StartWorkflowAction. The issue was resolved by ensuring the PHP protobuf extension is installed.
userImpact: Users cannot create schedules with workflows due to a deprecated field error, blocking core workflow scheduling functionality.
rootCause: Missing PHP protobuf extension causes deprecation warnings to be treated as errors in the generated ScheduleSpec DTO.
proposedFix: Install the PHP protobuf extension to properly handle the deprecated field and suppress the warning.
resolutionDetails: Issue resolved by installing PHP protobuf extension. Related deprecations were fixed in PR #523.
keyQuote: Resolved by adding PHP `protobuf` extension. Other deprecations were fixed in #523
